   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to CellMincer's documentation!
======================================

*CellMincer* is a software package for training and deploying self-supervised denoising models for voltage imaging.

The :ref:`Introduction <introduction>` section offers a brief overview of the package and examples of its output.

The :ref:`Modules <modules>` section describes the three CLI tools offered by CellMincer and their usage.
